Articles.Content:
Hi guys, so lately i've been playing ksp scenarios, and i wanted to play the community ones (for stock crafts), so i wanted to know if there is a good updated (1.0.4 +) scenarios out there i could download, anything you could recommend me would be nice.

Thanks a lot!
So no one makes scenarios or i'm not at the right forum?
I checked out both your posts in hopes of finding out what scenarios were - Do you have some examples of ones you've played? Maybe I know them by another name.
